sensortoolkit._plotting.plot_formatting.Wrap_Text¶

Wrap_Text(labels, max_label_len=10)[source]¶

Formats plotting text with line breaks based on specified text length.

Code modified via Stack Overflow user DavidG code: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/47057789/matplotlib-wrap-text-in-legend

Args:
labels (list):

list plotting labels (strings) such as header/title text

max_label_len (int):

The maximum number of characters on a single line. Labels longer than this will have a newline ‘

‘ inserted at every max_label_len

number of characters.

Returns:
labels (list):

Modified list of labels with the newline character ‘

‘ inserted

for labels exceeding the max_label_len.
